title: Cultivating Smart City Community Leaders: Gamification-Based Project Learning in [Large-Scale] Initiatives

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy, experience in solving social issues
context.additional_context: Enhanced motivation through collaborative learning and gamification elements using digital devices, applying smart city core concepts (urban planning, data analysis, community engagement) to social problem-solving projects.

learning_goals: Learners can design solutions to social problems using smart city core technologies (IoT, big data, digital twin).
Learners can develop three or more community engagement strategies through gamification systems.
Learners can demonstrate role distribution and communication skills in large-scale team projects using digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
